text: Hukmrān ke lie bhī zamīn alag karnī hai. Yih zamīn muqaddas ḳhitte kī mashriqī had se le kar mulk kī mashriqī sarhad tak aur muqaddas ḳhitte kī maġhribī had se le kar samundar tak hogī. Chunāṅche mashriq se maġhrib tak muqaddas ḳhitte aur hukmrān ke ilāqe kā mil milā kar fāsilā utnā hai jitnā qabāylī ilāqoṅ kā hai.
